summary.span: 在树结构中显示分层数据，例如目录。

span.span: Displays hierarchical data, such as a table of contents, in a tree structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [节点Nodes](#nodes) - [静态数据Static Data](#static_data) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [动态节点填充Dynamic Node Population](#dynamic_node_population) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [滚动Scrolling](#scrolling) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件可用于在树结构中显示分层数据，例如目录或文件目录的表，并支持以下功能：The control is used to display hierarchical data, such as a table of contents or file directory, in a tree structure and supports the following features: - 数据绑定，允许要绑定到 XML，表格，或关系数据的控件节点。Data binding that allows the nodes of the control to be bound to XML, tabular, or relational data. - 通过与集成站点导航控件。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 节点可以显示为纯文本或超链接的文本。Node text that can be displayed as either plain text or hyperlinks. - 以编程方式访问对象模型，以便创建树、 填充节点、 等动态设置属性。Programmatic access to the object model to create trees, populate nodes, set properties, and so on dynamically. - 客户端节点 （在支持的浏览器） 的填充。Client-side node population (on supported browsers). - 显示每个节点旁的复选框的功能。The ability to display a check box next to each node. - 通过主题、 用户定义的可自定义外观的图像和样式。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, and styles. > [!NOTE] > 控件设计内部使用控制时，才设置为`true`。The control is designed to be used inside an control only when is set to `true`. 控制用于更新而不是使用回发更新整个页面的页面的选定的区域。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 节点Nodes 控件组成的节点。The control is made up of nodes. 在树中的每个条目都称为一个节点，它由对象。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 节点类型定义，如下所示：Node types are defined as follows: - 包含其他节点的节点称为*父节点*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. - 包含的另一个节点的节点称为*子节点*。The node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. - 没有任何子级的节点称为*叶节点*。A node that has no children is called a *leaf node*. - 不包含任何其他节点但它是到所有其他节点的上级的节点是*根节点*。The node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 节点可以是父级和子级，但根，父级，和叶节点是互相排斥。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 节点的多个视觉和行为的属性确定一个节点为根、 子或叶节点。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a root, child, or leaf node. 尽管典型的树结构只包含一个根节点，控件，可将多个根节点添加到你树结构。Although a typical tree structure has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 当你想要显示项列表而不显示单个根节点，如下所示的产品类别列表时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single root node, as in a list of product categories. 每个节点具有属性和属性。Each node has a property and a property. 值属性显示在，虽然属性用来存储有关该节点，如与节点相关联的回发事件传递数据的任何其他数据。The value of the property is displayed in the , while the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data that is passed to the postback event that is associated with the node. 节点可以是在两种模式之一中： 选择模式和导航模式。A node can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置属性为空字符串以外的值的节点 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置属性节点为空字符串 ("")。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to an empty string (""). > [!NOTE] > 某些 Internet 浏览器有可能会影响的性能限制控件。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 具有的 URL 字符限制为发的 2067年字符。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果某个节点的 URL 中的字符数大于该数字，展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. ## 静态数据Static Data 最简单的数据模型的控件是静态的数据。The simplest data model of the control is static data. 若要显示使用声明性语法的静态数据，请首先打开和关闭``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To display static data using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，按照嵌套创建树状结构``元素开始标记和结束之间``标记。Next, create the tree structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每个``元素表示树中的节点，并将映射到对象。Each `` element represents a node in the tree and maps to a object. 你可以通过设置特性的设置的每个节点属性其``元素。You can set the properties of each node by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要创建子节点，嵌套其他``元素开始标记和结束之间``父节点的标记。To create child nodes, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent node. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件还可以绑定到数据。The control can also be bound to data. 你可以使用两种方法之一绑定控件添加到适当的数据源类型：You can use either of two methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 控件可以使用任何数据源控件，实现接口，如控件或控件。The control can use any data source control that implements the interface, such as an control or a control. 若要将绑定到数据源控件，将设置属性控制转移到数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 这是将绑定到数据的首选的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 控件还可以绑定到对象或具有关系对象。The control can also be bound to an object or a object with relations. 若要将绑定到这些数据源之一，将设置属性控件拖到数据源，然后调用方法。To bind to one of these data sources, set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 当绑定到数据源的每个数据项都包含 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的多个属性节点显示返回的值`ToString`的数据项，默认情况下的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，节点显示的元素名称，其显示在树的基础结构，但其他方面不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise. 你可以通过指定树节点绑定使用绑定到特定数据项属性节点集合。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings using the collection. 集合包含`TreeNodeBinding`定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的对象。The collection contains `TreeNodeBinding` objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 你可以指定的绑定和数据项属性的节点中显示的条件。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 在树节点绑定上的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on tree node bindings, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 恶意用户可以创建一个回调请求并获取数据的节点页开发人员未显示的控件。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，数据源必须实现的数据的安全。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 不要使用属性来隐藏数据。Do not use the property to hide data. ## 动态节点填充Dynamic Node Population 有时，它是不可行以静态定义树的结构，因为数据源返回的数据太多，或者要显示的数据取决于在运行时获取的信息。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically define the tree structure because the data source returns too much data or because the data to display depends on information that you get at run time. 因此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充一个节点，必须定义包含用于填充的节点的逻辑的事件处理方法事件。To populate a node dynamically, you must define an event-handling method that contains the logic to populate a node for the event. 浏览器支持回调脚本还可以利用客户端节点填充。Browsers that support callback scripts can also take advantage of client-side node population. （这包括 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更高版本以及某些其他浏览器。）客户端节点填充使控件来填充时用户展开节点，而无需到服务器的往返行程使用客户端脚本的节点。(This includes Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and some other browsers.) Client-side node population enables the control to populate a node using client script when users expand the node, without requiring a round trip to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 有多种方法，以自定义的外观控件。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先，你可以为每个节点类型指定不同的样式 （如字体大小和颜色）。First, you can specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the node types. 级联样式表 (CSS) 用于自定义控件的外观，如果使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不要同时。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 在上使用的控件的样式表的详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出可用的节点样式。The following table lists the available node styles. |节点样式属性Node style property|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于节点的样式设置。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||叶节点的样式设置。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||节点的默认样式设置。The default style settings for a node.| ||父节点的样式设置。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根节点的样式设置。The style settings for the root node.| ||所选节点的样式设置。The style settings for a selected node.| 你可以通过使用来控制节点在树中的特定深度的样式集合。You can also control the style of nodes at specific depths within the tree by using the collection. 集合中的第一个样式对应于的节点在树中的第一个级别的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the first level in the tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于的节点在树中，依次类推中的第二个级别的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the second level in the tree, and so on. 这是最常用于生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一深度节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点。This is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. > [!NOTE] > 如果为某些深度级别使用定义样式集合，因此样式重写任何根、 父节点还是叶节点的节点的该深度的样式设置。If a style is defined for a certain depth level using the collection, that style overrides any root, parent, or leaf node style settings for the nodes at that depth. 若要更改控件的外观的另一种方法是自定义中显示的图像的控件。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images that are displayed in the control. 可以通过设置以下表所示的属性来指定您自己自定义控件的不同部分的图像集。You can specify your own custom set of images for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |映像属性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||为可折叠的节点的指示符显示的图像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the collapsible node indicator. 此映像通常是一个减号 （-）。This image is usually a minus sign (-).| ||用于可展开的节点的指示符显示的图像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the expandable node indicator. 此映像通常是一个加号 （+）。This image is usually a plus sign (+).| ||包含用于连接到子节点的父节点的行映像的文件夹 URL。The URL to the folder containing the line images used to connect parent nodes to child nodes. 属性还必须设置为`true`此属性产生任何影响。The property must also be set to `true` for this property to have an effect.| ||用于非可展开的节点的指示符显示的图像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the non-expandable node indicator.| > [!NOTE] > 不需要自定义每个图像属性。You do not need to customize every image property. 如果未显式设置映像属性，会使用内置的默认图像。If an image property is not explicitly set, the built-in default image is used. 控件还使你可以显示一个节点旁的复选框。The control also allows you to display a check box next to a node. 当属性设置为值`TreeNodeTypes.None`，指定的节点类型旁显示复选框。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeTypes.None`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node types. > [!NOTE] > 属性可以设置为的按位组合枚举成员值。The property can be set to a bitwise combination of the enumeration member values. 该页发送到服务器，每次集合会自动填充的所选节点。Each time the page is posted to the server, the collection is automatically populated with the selected nodes. 复选框显示时，你可以使用事件的发往服务器之间的复选框的状态发生更改时运行的自定义的例程。When check boxes are displayed, you can use the event to run a custom routine whenever the state of a check box changes between posts to the server. ## 事件Events 控件提供可以编程的多个事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这允许你每次事件发生时运行的自定义的例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了支持的事件控件。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生时的复选框控件更改发往服务器之间的状态。Occurs when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server.| ||在 控件中选定某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is selected in the control.| ||在 控件中展开某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.| ||在 控件中折叠某个节点时发生。Occurs when a node is collapsed in the control.| ||当其 属性设置为 `true` 的节点在 控件中展开时发生。Occurs when a node with its property set to `true` is expanded in the control.| ||将数据项绑定到 控件中的某个节点时发生。Occurs when a data item is bound to a node in the control.| ## 滚动Scrolling 控件不具有内置滚动。The control does not have built-in scrolling. 要添加滚动，放中控制控件并将添加到的滚动条控件。To add scrolling, place the control in a control and add scrollbars to the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[面板 Web 服务器控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b)。For more information, see [Panel Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本部分包含七个代码示例：This section contains seven code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何设置第二个代码示例的帧。The first code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the second code example. - 第二个代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法，以显示中的静态数据控件。The second code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. - 第三个代码示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源的控件。The third code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. - 第四个代码示例为第三个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The fourth code example provides sample XML data for the third code example. - 第五个代码示例演示如何使用通过将其绑定到的站点导航控件控件。The fifth code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. - 第六个代码示例的第五个代码示例提供示例站点地图数据。The sixth code example provides sample site map data for the fifth code example. - 第七个代码示例演示如何填充中的节点从客户端的控件。The seventh code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下面的代码示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法，以显示中的静态数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. 此示例在上述示例的帧集内用于显示的内容表。This example is used within the frame set of the preceding example to display a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/CS/treeviewframecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/VB/treeviewframevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```
``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通过将其绑定到的站点导航控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制后此代码示例中，到名为 Web.sitemap 提供的示例站点站点地图数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/CS/treeviewautogeneratebindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/VB/treeviewautogeneratebindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code example provides sample site map data for the preceding code example. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何填充中的节点从客户端的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 启用客户端节点填充后，会自动填充节点，客户端，而无需回发到服务器上。When client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 树节点绑定所定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。Tree node bindings define the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to. 在绑定到其中的每个数据项包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的数据源时控件需要知道哪个数据项属性绑定到哪个属性。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), the control needs to know which data item property to bind to which property. 如果属性设置为`true`、控件自动生成设置的默认树节点绑定属性绑定到该键的值与关联的对象返回`ToString`数据项目的方法。If the property is set to `true`, the control automatically generates default tree node bindings that set the property of the object that is associated with the binding to the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item. > [!NOTE] > 不会自动生成的树节点绑定添加到集合。The automatically generated tree node bindings are not added to the collection. 在 XML 元素，返回的值的情况下`ToString`方法是元素名称，但显示的基础结构的 XML 文件中，否则不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method is the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the XML file, but is not very useful otherwise. 若要创建一个更有用的树，必须定义你自己的树节点绑定通过填充集合。To create a more useful tree, you must define your own tree node bindings by populating the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果你定义集合，控件而不是自动生成的树节点绑定中使用这些值。If you define a collection, the control uses those values instead of automatically generated tree node bindings. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何通过设置来禁用自动生成树节点绑定属性`false`。The first code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. 第二个代码示例的第一个代码示例提供示例站点地图数据。The second code example provides sample site map data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置来禁用自动生成树节点绑定属性`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. A然后定义集合之间建立关系中的数据项控制和的节点控件。A collection is then defined to establish the relationship between the data items in a control and the nodes of the control. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制后此代码示例中，到名为 Web.sitemap 提供的示例站点站点地图数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果复选框将显示在控件 (通过设置属性的值以外的其他`TreeNodeType.None`)，使用属性来确定哪些节点显示选中的复选框。When check boxes are displayed in the control (by setting the property to a value other than `TreeNodeType.None`), use the property to determine which nodes display a selected check box. 此集合通常用于循环访问已选中的复选框，在树中的所有节点。This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the nodes that have a selected check box in the tree. 引发事件时的复选框控件更改发往服务器之间的状态。The event is raised when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新数据库或显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 使用树形结构的深度优先遍历填充集合： 之前填充下一步的父节点，处理每个父节点及其子节点下。The collection is populated using a depth-first traversal of the tree structure: each parent node is processed down to its child nodes before the next parent node is populated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪些节点已选中的复选框控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which nodes have a selected check box in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否可折叠节点指示符的自定义映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 此映像可折叠节点旁边显示，并且通常是一个减号 （-）。This image is displayed next to a collapsible node and is usually a minus sign (-). 当属性设置为`true`、控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or a minus sign(-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置属性`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保节点中正确对齐控制使用自定义映像时，请确保指定的所有映像， ，和属性具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 在自定义映像用作可折叠节点指示符时，你还应考虑设置属性来指定映像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the collapsible node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定是否可折叠节点指示符的自定义映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 对于来显示和控件中显示的图像的代码示例中，你必须提供自己的映像和属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象定义数据项与其绑定到的节点之间的关系。

value.span: 表示数据项与其绑定到的节点之间关系的一个 。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 集合包含定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的对象。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 当绑定到数据源的每个数据项都包含 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的多个属性节点显示返回的值`ToString`的数据项，默认情况下的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 对于 XML 元素，该节点显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的树中，否则不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 可以通过指定的树节点绑定来绑定到特定数据项属性节点。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings. 在定义数据项和节点之间的关系时，必须指定为绑定和值要绑定到的属性的两个条件对象。When defining the relationship between a data item and a node, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the values to bind to the properties of object. 该条件指示应在何时数据项绑定到的节点。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a node. 与节点深度和 / 或数据成员，可以指定条件。The criteria can be specified with a node depth, a data member, or both. 节点深度指定获取绑定的节点级别。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，如果你指定的节点深度为 0，级别 0 树状结构中的所有节点会都绑定使用的树节点绑定。For example, if you specify a node depth of 0, all nodes in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the tree node binding. 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 如果选择多个对象定义相互冲突控件适用以下优先顺序中的树节点绑定：If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 只定义深度的对象。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 定义仅的数据成员的对象。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 如果多个绑定指定了符合相同的优先级条件，则应用集合中的第一个绑定。If multiple bindings are specified that meet the same precedence criteria, the first binding in the collection is applied. 一旦建立绑定条件时，你可以随后绑定的属性可以绑定到一个值的对象。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 你可以将绑定到某个属性或字段的数据项，或显示静态值。You can either bind to an attribute or field of a data item or display a static value. 有关绑定的属性的更多信息对象转换为一个值，请参阅。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 尽管可以以编程方式填充集合，通常以声明方式设置。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定的树节点绑定，应首先嵌套开始和结束``开始和结束标记之间的标记控件。To specify the tree node bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，将放置``元素开始标记和结束之间``标记每个树节点绑定你想要指定。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each tree node binding you want to specify. 数据绑定中设置的创建时属性控制转移到`true`，创建的绑定具有属性设置为`true`。When data bindings are created by setting the property of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以声明方式创建的数据绑定都具有属性设置为`false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用声明性语法，可控制各个数据绑定的行为。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的集合。The first code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 此示例仅指定绑定属性。This example specifies only the property of the binding. 略微的性能增益无法添加的还指定属性。A slight performance gain could be added by also specifying the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性指定是否控件呈现兼容的浏览器来处理展开和折叠事件上的客户端脚本。Use the property to specify whether the control renders client-side script on compatible browsers to handle expanding and collapsing events. 当此属性设置为`true`，兼容的浏览器执行的代码可展开和折叠客户端上的节点。When this property is set to `true`, compatible browsers execute the code to expand and collapse nodes on the client. 必须为客户端脚本，以便提前知道树节点数据。The tree node data must be known in advance for the client-side script to work. 使用客户端脚本可以阻止发布回服务器每次节点是展开还是折叠。Using client script prevents a post back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 节点时提前不知道的树节点数据，可以从客户端，如果填充`PopulateNodesFromClient`属性也设置为`true`。When the tree node data is not known in advance, nodes can be populated from the client, if the `PopulateNodesFromClient` property is also set to `true`. 在此方案中，你还必须提供的事件处理方法事件以填充节点。In this scenario, you must also provide an event-handling method for the event to populate the nodes. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`false`、控件回发到服务器每次节点是展开还是折叠。If the property is set to `false`, the control posts back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性来呈现用于上展开和折叠节点兼容的浏览器的客户端脚本。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来呈现用于上展开和折叠节点兼容的浏览器的客户端脚本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 请注意，向服务器发送需要展开和折叠节点时属性设置为`false`。Notice that a post to the server is required to expand and collapse a node when the property is set to `false`. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/CS/treeviewenableclientscriptcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/VB/treeviewenableclientscriptvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定用于可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 此映像可展开节点旁边显示，并且通常是一个加号 （+）。This image is displayed next to an expandable node and is usually a plus sign (+). 当属性设置为`true`、控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置属性`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保节点中正确对齐控制使用自定义映像时，请确保指定的所有映像， ，和属性具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 若要正确显示的自定义映像，你可能需要设置到`false`。To display a custom image correctly, you may need to set to `false`. 在自定义映像用作可展开的节点指示符时，你还应考虑设置属性来指定映像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the expandable node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定用于可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 对于来显示和控件中显示的图像的代码示例中，你必须提供自己的映像和属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 仅在支持脚本的客户端上支持此功能。This feature is supported only on script-capable clients. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用属性，必须包含``具有元素`runat="server"`属性。To use the property, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. > [!NOTE] > 样式设置属性重写中的任何相应节点样式设置， ， ， ，或属性。The style settings for the property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the , , , , or property. 属性不呈现的节点其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 与不同和属性，它们是对象，属性是对象。Unlike the and the properties, which are objects, the property is a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制节点的外观，当鼠标指针悬停。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 对于此示例正常工作，必须包括``具有元素`runat="server"`属性。For this example to work, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定要使用的图像的组控件。Use the property to specify the group of images to use for the control. 你可以选择一组预定义的映像以使控件具有标准外观或定义你自己的自定义一组。You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set. > [!NOTE] > 属性不会影响节点任何样式设置。The property does not affect any style settings for a node. 设置适当的样式属性，如属性，如果你想要添加自定义颜色和间距。Set the appropriate style property, such as the property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing. 下表列出的有效值属性。The following table lists the valid values for The property. |图像集Image set|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|使用箭头映像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses arrow images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|使用菱形项目符号图像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|使用方形项目符号图像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|预定义的、分节的菱形项目符号图像集。A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|预定义的、大小随级别不同而变化的、分节的备用菱形项目符号图像集。A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|使用 MSN Messenger 映像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|用户定义的图像集。A user-defined image set.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|使用事件日志样式的图像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|使用 FAQ 样式的图像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|使用电子邮件样式的图像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses email-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|使用新闻组样式的图像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|概括介绍了使用简单形状的预定义的图像集。A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|使用简单已填充的形状的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|使用 MSDN 映像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|使用 Microsoft Windows 帮助映像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|使用 Microsoft Windows XP 中可用的 Windows 资源管理器映像的预定义的映像集。A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.| 在定义一组自定义映像时，应为每个以下表中的属性来指定一个图像。When defining a custom set of images, you should specify an image for each of the properties in the following table. 否则，使用该属性的默认图像。Otherwise, the default image for that property is used. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||可折叠的节点的指示符用于自定义图像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.| ||用于可展开的节点的指示符的自定义图像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.| ||包含有关连接节点的行的自定义映像的文件夹 URL。The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.| ||用于非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义图像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示的图像中的 Windows 资源管理器集控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的叶节点的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. 如果你需要生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的叶节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作为单个样式属性的替代方法的集合 (如属性) 来控制节点的树中各个级别上的样式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree. 集合中的第一个样式对应于树的第一个级别中的节点的样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于为树中，依次类推的第二个级别中的节点的样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on. 此属性通常用于确定生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点。This property is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. 按以下顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性创建导航菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a navigation menu. 控件始终是完全展开，与展开节点指示符和隐藏的映像。The control is always fully expanded, with the expansion node indicators and images hidden. 此外，属性用于控制节点级别的间距。Also, the property is used to control the spacing of the node levels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示连接到父节点的子节点的行时属性设置为`true`。The control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the property is set to `true`. 当显示行时，使用属性以指定包含的一套用于行预呈现的图像的 Web 访问文件夹。When lines are displayed, use the property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines. 下表描述了使用映像控件。The following table describes the images that are used by the control. |图像Image|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gifDash.gif|当树状结构中的只有一个根节点，并且根节点的根节点旁边显示的线条图像是叶节点。A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.| |Dashminus.gifDashminus.gif|减号 （-） 以指示根节点已展开的树结构中只有一个根节点时，根节点旁边显示图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.| |Dashplus.gifDashplus.gif|树状结构，以指示已折叠的根节点中只有一个根节点时显示的根节点旁边的加号 （+） 图像。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.| |I.gifI.gif|显示连接相邻的节点的行图像。A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.| |L.gifL.gif|显示的线条图像下一步到最后一个节点在分支中的叶节点时。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.| |Lminus.gifLminus.gif|显示的线条图像下一步到最后一个节点在以指示该节点已展开的分支中。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Lplus.gifLplus.gif|显示的线条图像下一步到最后一个节点中一个分支，以便指示该节点已折叠。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.| |Minus.gifMinus.gif|减号 （-） 包含多个根节点，以指示该节点已展开的树结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此图像不包含额外的行，并且仅一次折叠的根节点后显示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once. 当首次加载页时，将显示 Rminus.gif 图像。When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.| |Noexpand.gifNoexpand.gif|叶节点旁边显示的空白分隔条图像。A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node. 此映像允许文本垂直对齐。This image allows text to line up vertically.| |Plus.gifPlus.gif|显示树状结构包含多个根节点，则指示节点中的第一个根节点旁边的加号 （+） 映像处于折叠状态。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此映像不包含额外的行和根节点展开一次后才显示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once. 当首次加载页时，将显示 Rplus.gif 图像。When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.| |R.gifR.gif|在包含多个根节点，则指示节点的树结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示的线条图像是一个叶节点。A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.| |Rminus.gifRminus.gif|减号 （-） 包含多个根节点，以指示该节点已展开的树结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示图像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此映像包含额外的行，仅当首次加载页时，才显示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 后根节点具有已折叠后显示 Minus.gif 图像。After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.| |Rplus.gifRplus.gif|显示树状结构包含多个根节点，则指示节点中的第一个根节点旁边的加号 （+） 映像处于折叠状态。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此映像包含额外的行，仅当首次加载页时，才显示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 后根节点已展开后，会显示该 Plus.gif 图像。After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.| |T.gifT.gif|中间树形结构 （t 型交叉） 处的节点旁边的显示以指示该节点是叶行图像。A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.| |Tminus.gifTminus.gif|减号 （-） 中间树形结构 （t 型交叉） 处的节点旁边的显示以指示该节点已展开的映像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Tplus.gifTplus.gif|中间树形结构 （t 型交叉） 处的节点旁边的显示以指示该节点已折叠的加号 （+） 图像。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置属性，控件将使用内置的默认图像 （20 x 20 像素为单位）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 某些可视化设计器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 提供生成的行映像的工具。Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images. 运行的时不能翻转右到左显示的自定义的映像。The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays. 若要支持从左到右和从右到左的网页，你必须创建两个方向的映像集。To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以指定包含要在中显示的线条图像的文件夹控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the folder that contains the line images to display in the control. 若要使用此示例中，使用行设计器工具事先创建一组行映像。To work with this example, use the Line Designer tool beforehand to create a set of line images. 将它们放在名为示例应用程序目录中 LineImages 文件夹中。Place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application. summary.span: 获取或设置要绑定到 控件的最大树级别数。

value.span: 默认值为 -1，这会将数据源中的所有树级别绑定到该控件。

span.span: The default is -1, which binds all the tree levels in the data source to the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在绑定时控件添加到数据源，使用属性可限制要绑定到控件的树级别数。When binding the control to a data source, use the property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control. 例如，将此属性设置为`2`将只有根节点和任何节点到根节点下的绑定控件。For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the control. 数据源中的所有剩余节点将被忽略。All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 恶意用户可以创建一个回调请求并获取数据的节点页开发人员未显示的控件。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，数据源必须实现的数据的安全。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 不要使用属性来隐藏数据。Do not use the property to hide data. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用属性将仅前两个节点级别 （深度 0 和 1） 绑定到控件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将仅前两个节点级别 （深度 0 和 1） 绑定到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 数据源中的所有节点级别将被都忽略。All node levels in the data source are ignored. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth/CS/treeviewmaxdatabinddepthcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth/VB/treeviewmaxdatabinddepthvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取对象，其中包含在树中的所有根节点。Use the property to get a object that contains all the root nodes in the tree. 此集合通常用于快速循环访问所有根节点，或访问林中的某个特定的根节点。This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree. > [!NOTE] > 典型的树结构只包含一个根节点;但是，你可以添加到多个根节点控件。A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the control. 属性还可以用于以编程方式管理在树的根节点。The property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically. 你可以添加、 插入、 删除和检索从集合的对象。You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects from the collection. 对集合的任何更新会自动反映在往返到服务器下一步后的控件。Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the control after the next round trip to the server. 若要访问根节点的子节点，使用节点的属性。To access the child nodes of a root node, use the property of the node. 使用的每个后续的父级别节点下的节点级别导航属性。Use the property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用遍历树的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the tree. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCount/CS/treenodecollectioncountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeCollectionCount/VB/treenodecollectioncountvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制中的节点的默认外观控件。Use the property to control the default appearance of a node in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `NodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `NodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. > [!NOTE] > 中的相应节点样式设置， ，或属性重写的样式设置属性。The corresponding node style settings in the , , or properties override the style settings of the property. 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 非可展开节点指示器映像 （或分隔） 旁边将显示 （代替可展开和折叠节点指示器中） 的叶节点对齐具有父或根节点的叶节点。The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes. 当属性设置为`true`、控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置属性`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保节点中正确对齐控制使用自定义映像时，请确保指定的所有映像， ，和属性具有相同的尺寸。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 对于来显示和控件中显示的图像的代码示例中，你必须提供自己的映像和属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/CS/treeviewcustomimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewCustomImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewCustomImage/VB/treeviewcustomimagevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用控件以引发事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 它通常由控件开发人员在扩展类。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充一个节点，请首先设置到节点的属性`true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，定义的事件处理方法以编程方式填充该节点的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构节点中填充的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 通过添加创建节点结构对象添加到父节点的集合。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支持的浏览器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容的浏览器及更高版本) 还可以利用的客户端节点填充。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 如果启用，这将允许控件动态填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的父节点的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的父节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewParentNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewParentNodeStyle/CS/treeviewparentnodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewParentNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewParentNodeStyle/VB/treeviewparentnodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 除了填充按需的节点，则可以填充直接上支持的客户端浏览器的节点。In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser. 当属性设置为`true`，从客户端来填充树节点中，而不需要将回发到服务器调用服务。When the property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server. 否则为控件回发到服务器以填充节点。Otherwise, the control posts back to the server to populate the nodes. > [!NOTE] > 属性还必须设置为`true`顺序属性设置为`true`。The property must also be set to `true` in order for the property to be set to `true`. 若要填充客户端上的节点，请首先设置属性`true`然后设置到节点的属性`true`。To populate a node on the client, first set the property to `true` and then set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，定义的事件处理方法以编程方式填充该节点的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构节点中填充的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 通过添加创建节点结构对象添加到父节点的集合。You create a node structure by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. > [!NOTE] > 在浏览器支持回调脚本中支持的客户端节点填充功能。The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts. 若要检查浏览器是否支持回调脚本访问，请使用属性类。To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the property of the class. 您可以访问的实例通过当前请求的类属性类。You can access the instance of the class for the current request through the property of the class. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来启用客户端中的节点填充控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable client-side population of the nodes in the control. 请注意，启用客户端节点填充后，节点会自动填充客户端，而无需回发到服务器上。Notice that when client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的根节点的外观控件。Use the property to control the appearance of the root node in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性对象 (例如， `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 4. 。. 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用而不是设置单个属性样式属性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的根节点的外观控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the root node in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的节点的文本控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式和导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置属性为空字符串以外的值的节点 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置属性节点为空字符串 ("")。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to empty string (""). 当节点处于选择模式时，用户可以通过单击的节点中的文本选择的节点。When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node. 使用属性来确定哪个节点选择中控件。Use the property to determine which node is selected in the control. > [!NOTE] > 节点不能选择何时控件显示超链接。A node cannot be selected when the control displays hyperlinks. 当显示超链接时，属性始终返回`null`。When hyperlinks are displayed, the property always returns `null`. 当用户选择中的其他节点通过单击中的新节点的文本控件引发事件时，默认情况下。When the user selects a different node in the control by clicking the text in the new node, the event is raised, by default. 你可以通过设置指定一个不同的事件属性的属性。You can specify a different event by setting the property for the property. 下表列出可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引发或事件，根据需要。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 的节点不呈现其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定在所选节点的值控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the selected node in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/CS/treeviewselectednodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/VB/treeviewselectednodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 控件中选定某个节点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a node is selected in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中选择节点时，将引发事件控件。The event is raised when a node is selected in the control. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 你可以选择性地设置节点以指定在选择该节点时引发的事件的属性。You can optionally set the property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected. 下表列出可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引发或事件，根据需要。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||在选定节点时引发 和 两个事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 的节点不呈现其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 用户单击节点时，仅在开机自检上激发事件。The event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node. 如果不激发事件属性以编程方式更改。The event is not fired if the property is changed programmatically. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以更新控制节点中的选中控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a control when a node is selected in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/CS/treeviewselectednodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/VB/treeviewselectednodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提供中的多节点选择支持控件，可以显示节点的映像旁边的复选框。To provide multi-node selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node. 使用属性以指定哪些节点类型将显示一个复选框。Use the property to specify which node types will display a check box. 例如，如果此属性设置为`TreeNodeType.Parent`，每个父节点在树中显示复选框。For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree. 下表列出了此属性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |节点类型Node type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeType.All`|所有节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Leaf`|对于所有叶节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.None`|不显示复选框。Check boxes are not displayed.| |`TreeNodeType.Parent`|显示所有父节点的复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Root`|为所有根节点显示复选框。Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.| 用于枚举类型属性是标志枚举，该对话框可以通过按位运算组合值。The enumeration type that is used for the property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations. 例如，若要显示父节点和叶节点的复选框，用于按位 OR 运算符合并`TreeNodeType.Parent`和`TreeNodeType.Leaf`值。For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values. 若要确定哪个节点拥有其复选框选择，循环访问的节点集合。To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以重写设置通过设置每个节点的属性。You can override the setting by setting the property for each node. 如果你需要提供仅单选支持，请考虑使用属性。If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示和隐藏的不同节点类型对应的复选框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the check boxes for the different node types. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/CS/treeviewshowcheckboxescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/VB/treeviewshowcheckboxesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 展开节点指示符用于显示节点是展开、 折叠的还是非可展开。Expansion node indicators are used to show whether a node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable. 使用属性指定是否在显示展开节点指示符控件。Use the property to specify whether the expansion node indicators are displayed in the control. 当属性设置为`true`、控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别占位符图像。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置， ，和属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示和隐藏展开节点图标。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the expansion node icons. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否显示要连接到父节点的子节点的行。Use the property to specify whether the lines that are connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed. 当此属性设置为`true`、控件搜索由指定的 Web 访问文件夹行映像的属性。When this property is set to `true`, the control searches the Web-accessible folder that is specified by the property for the line images. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置属性，控件将使用内置的默认图像 （20 x 20 像素为单位）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示行中的节点相连控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display lines connecting nodes in the control. 请务必使用行设计器工具创建一组行映像并将其放在名为示例应用程序目录中 LineImages 文件夹中。Be sure to use the Line Designer tool to create a set of line images and place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它用于为屏幕读取器呈现替换文字以跳过该控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text for screen readers to skip the content for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串， 将其呈现为不可见图像的替换文字，作为对屏幕读取器的提示。

span.span: A string that the renders as alternate text with an invisible image as a hint to screen readers.

value.span: 默认为“跳过导航链接”。

span.span: The default is "Skip Navigation Links."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个属性，可以设置以使网页更多或更少可访问。The property is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible. 网页包含重复的内容可以提供用于屏幕阅读器，以跳过不进行读取的内容的用户的机制。Web pages that contain content that repeats can provide for a mechanism for users of screen readers to skip the content from being read aloud. 控件提供屏幕读取器可以跳过整个控件的方法的属性。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果属性设置，则呈现不可见的图像的替换文字，向用户提供的选项以跳转到该控件的结尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 屏幕读取器读取的替换文字，而图像占用只有一个像素的空间。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, while the image occupies only one pixel space. 对于页面的呈现的像素精确控制，设置属性为空字符串 ("") 并提供你自己的机制以跳过该树。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the tree. 属性默认情况下，这使得屏幕读取器不跳过控件设置为空字符串。The property is set to the empty string by default, which makes screen readers not skip the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

## Remarks 数据项绑定到中的一个节点时将引发事件控件。The event is raised when a data item is bound to a node in the control. 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用事件时满足某个条件更改节点的映像。The first code example demonstrates how to use the event to change the image for a node when some condition is met. 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件时满足某个条件更改节点的映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to change the image for a node when some condition is met. 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 此外请务必提供对于此示例显示你自己的映像。Also be sure to provide your own images for this example to display. span.span: Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中展开节点时将引发事件控件。The event is raised when a node is expanded in the control. 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果节点的属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`或`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`、在中单击该节点时，也会引发事件控件。If the property for a node is set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand` or `TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`, the event is also raised when that node is clicked in the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以更新的内容控制时的用户扩展中的节点控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the content of a control when the user expands a node in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeExpand/CS/treeviewtreenodeexpandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeExpand/VB/treeviewtreenodeexpandvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TreeNodePopulate As TreeNodeEventHandler

summary.span: 当其 属性设置为 的节点在 控件中展开时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a node with its property set to is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充一个节点，请首先设置到节点的属性`true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下来，定义的事件处理方法以编程方式填充该节点的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that populates the node programmatically. 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构节点中填充的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 通过添加创建节点结构对象添加到父节点的集合。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 当节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支持的浏览器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容的浏览器及更高版本) 还可以利用的客户端节点填充。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 如果启用，这将允许控件来填充动态客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以填充中的节点动态在服务器上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to populate the nodes in the control dynamically on the server. 请注意，属性设置为`false`以防止客户端上处理展开节点事件。Notice that the property is set to `false` to prevent expanding-node events from being handled on the client. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/CS/treeviewtreenodepopulatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/VB/treeviewtreenodepopulatevb.aspx#1)]
